SATISFYING SOUND: The optimized sound signature creates an enhanced and relaxing enviornment to help you focus in your space.

Built to meet U. S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U. S

Fresh thinking. REFRESH 01’s intriguing design melds minimalist forms with pure function. 3 speed settings provide strikingly silent airflow on low up to a satisfying current of air that you’ll find...refreshing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sound. Mind & Body. Air is one of the greatest elemental sounds we experience - and the deep rush of air is something that has been proven to enhance relaxation and to provide focus by masking out environmental distractions. REFRESH 01’s intriguing design melds minimalist forms with pure function. 3 speed settings provide strikingly silent airflow on low up to a satisfying current of air that you’ll find…refreshing.

Refresh your personal space. The space-efficient fan is designed for desktop or bedside use and provides nearly silent airflow on low to vigorous airflow on high to suit the task at hand. Your comfort companion. From your desktop or night stand to the yoga mat, refresh your daily routine with the ideal airflow for your active lifestyle. Refresh and rejuvenate. Vigorous airflow refreshes your active lifestyle and provides rejuvenation during your cool down.

Control your comfort. 3 speed settings provide strikingly silent airflow on low up to a satisfying current of air that you’ll find…refreshing. Form and function. The minimalist modern design provides a refreshing amount of air that encourages fresh thinking. Fit-anywhere personal fan. Move the invigorating airflow around the room with you and/or reach those inconvenient outlets with a 6-foot power cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, powerful fan
reviews.reviewText: Does a great job and has nice power even on the lowest setting. The low setting is pretty much silent and the mid and high settings have a nice white noise effect to them (I use it on high at my desk to cover the noises my office mate makes while eating).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Powerful; but, not Silent.
reviews.reviewText: Electrician here. This is a powerful little fan. The blades are small; but, they spin fast. There are goods and bads though. On the good side, the fan is powerful (said that already). Even on low, one can feel the air. It's also very attractive. It's a good looking piece of equipment with a modern design and aesthetic appearance. The cord is long too. That's a helpful feature. The rubber "feet" are effective. It won't slide around the desktop or vibrate to make additional racket. Which brings me to the bad: It IS noisy. I assumed, with the "Sharper Image" brand name, it would be almost silent. It is not. Besides the sound of the wind being forced through the housing (which is considerable), the motor hums audibly. Obviously, this hum is directly proportional to the setting (low, medium, or high). Since it is a desktop fan (more on that in a moment), the sound might disturb one's work or interfere with audio communications. At the very least, it would make one turn up the volumes of other sounds to which one would be listening. As it is a desktop fan, there is only one angle of direction. FOR the desk, the angle is perfect. One cannot place it atop a tall file cabinet and point it down at oneself though. One cannot point it ANY other direction than the direction it points.I started this review with four stars. I figured, at the asking price, it is definitely worth it. Still, with the noise and the inability to adjust the angle, the product becomes average at best. Don't get me wrong, it's still a great value and a great fan. It's just a little noisy and positionally fixed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is so powerful and works really well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient AC-powered desktop fan, quiet and functional.
reviews.reviewText: I have this fan just behind my wide screen monitor on my home office desk. It's great for a cool breeze while working at the desk, and it takes up space that wouldn't otherwise be used productively. There's only so many bins of easter candy one person can sanely have on their desk, after all.It has more power than the USB-powered fans I've replaced with it, but it's still quiet and subtle on the desk. I generally use the lowest speed, but even at medium speed I barely notice the sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but effective!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this fan! I imagine anyone who finds themselves at a desk or cubical for much of the day, especially within the proximity of others, is going to absolutely love this fan. I am a teacher, and am naturally always on the warmer side - it doesn't help that my class isn't super well insulated! However, since my classroom isn't huge, whenever I use a bigger fan, then my students say it's too cold, and there is never a balance. This fan solves it, because it has enough horsepower to keep me cool regardless of the temperature, it is small enough that others aren't bothered by the gust of wind it produces. It has three settings, a high, medium, and low setting, and if my class just came from outside, I'll enjoy the high setting before switching to the medium setting to keep me cool as I do paperwork. When I'm in a meeting or on the phone, the low setting is quiet enough but still gives me some circulation. The silicone legs keep it from sliding off my desk, which is another great feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars QUIET & works like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: I've owned desk fans for decades. I work better with a little bit of air flow. Trouble is, the noise can be a distraction. In addition, they occupy precious real estate and must look professional.I opened this Sharper Image fan box yesterday and was immediately surprised. I expected an acceptable fan, but wasn't prepared to be impressed. It's built extremely solid, it's minimalist, yet highly effective while being whisper quiet (on the low setting).It's a well conceived design, executed with quality materials, which simply performs as it should. It doesn't vibrate, rattle, or whistle. It's got heft, without being bulky. The switch is simple and effective. It looks uncluttered and dignified.The volume of air it moves is surprising for its size, yet, it's not pushing a wall of air past you that would make hearing conversations or calls a problem. I don't imagine using it would be perceptible over calls or video chats either, which is saying something.Based on a couple hours usage, I'd highly recommend this fan. It's a simple tool, done better. Just like you'd expect.Two thumbs up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for hot flashes
reviews.reviewText: “Sharper Image REFRESH 01 Personal Desktop Fan“My wife has had horrible hot flashes for years. Whenever she gets one of these, she immediately needs a fan to help cool her off.This fan has worked out great for when she sits in her recliner to read or to watch a movie. The base of the fan fits into the cup holder of her recliner, so it’s right there when she needs it without having to get up. It’s great for portability, and it would be perfect for a nightstand as well.The fan is is fairly light and the fins are so close together that she can just place it in her lap or hold it in her hand while running it - there’s no danger of her fingers poking through any of the fins.The fan also runs very quietly on low and medium speeds, so if we’re watching a movie, we don’t even hear the fan. Plus, she can easily direct it onto only her without chilling me off.This is really a well designed and well made portable fan that provides plenty of air movement for instant relief.
